scripts.build: nest build && cp package.json package-lock.json dist/
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=dev nest start --watch
scripts.start:pm-dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=dev pm2 restart adaptlocal --update-env
scripts.start:stage: npm run build && NODE_ENV=stage pm2 stop adapt &&  pm2 start adapt --update-env --exp-backoff-restart-delay=100
scripts.start:simulate-prod: npm run build && pm2 stop main && NODE_ENV=stage pm2 start main --update-env --exp-backoff-restart-delay=100
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && pm2 stop main && NODE_ENV=prod pm2 start main  --update-env --exp-backoff-restart-delay=100
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run setup:sam && npm run build && rimraf .aws-sam && sam build --use-container && sam deploy --config-env dev --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run setup:sam && npm run build && rimraf .aws-sam && sam build --use-container && sam deploy --config-env stage --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run setup:sam && npm run build && rimraf .aws-sam && sam build --use-container && sam deploy --config-env prod --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.sam:local: npm run build && sam build --use-container && sam local start-api --profile default --region eu-central-1
scripts.deploy: npm ci && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.migration:generate-dev: npm run build && npm run typeorm-dev -- -o -d typeOrm.config.ts migration:generate migrations/migrateDb
scripts.migration:generate-stage: npm run build && npm run typeorm-stage -- -o -d typeOrm.config.ts migration:generate migrations/migrateDb
scripts.migration:generate-prod: npm run build && npm run typeorm-prod migration:generate -- -o -n
scripts.migration:run-dev: NODE_ENV=dev npm run build && npm run typeorm-dev migration:run -- -d ./typeOrm.config.ts
scripts.migration:run-stage: NODE_ENV=stage npm run build && npm run typeorm-stage migration:run -- -d ./typeOrm.config.ts
scripts.migration:run-prod: NODE_ENV=prod npm run build && npm run typeorm-prod migration:run
